The *marinerData* package provides some small 
Hi-C files for the *mariner* package vignettes and tests.

```{r}
library(marinerData)
hicFiles <- c(
    "FS" = LEUK_HEK_PJA27_inter_30.hic(),
    "WT" = LEUK_HEK_PJA30_inter_30.hic()
)
hicFiles
```
